Title: Love for labor is our virtue
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Youngsters doing voluntary labor at the Jiangwan Stadium (江湾体育场), Shanghai, a huge athletics and football stadium. It was built in 1934 as part of the Greater Shanghai Plan, a prestige project of Chiang Kai-Shek's Nationalist government.
